subject: coursera [bad] change of Terms of Use at any time
text:
> We reserve the right to change or modify the Terms of Use at our sole discretion at any time.

This is nothing unusual, right?

> Any change or modification to the Terms of Use will be effective immediately upon posting by us.
> For any material changes to the Terms, we will take reasonable steps to notify you of such changes.

There is no definition of what reasonable means

> In all cases, your continued use of the Sites after publication of such modifications, with or without notification, constitutes binding acceptance of these modified Terms of Use.

While the ToU are not visibly versioned, at the bottom of

   https://www.coursera.org/about/terms

There's a list of revisions - that's gotta count for something.
